Negative_Review: Some housekeeping issues Took a few requests to get amenities refilled and was accidently checked into a room that wasn t ready But the situation was remedied quickly
Positive_Review: Friendly staff excellent location

Negative_Review: The toilet was separated from the bathroom with no hand washing facilities in it
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful location was great and the cleanliness could not have been better When we return to Paris I would stay here again

Negative_Review: The breakfast Not good enough variety of dairy products and eggs even though we upgraded to the higher menu Staff at the restaurant have very little english knowledge
Positive_Review: The location is just the best you can get And we felt completely safe going out We actually felt at home Staff were very friendly and helpful when we needed them I found the bed quite comfortable And the Wifi speed was great Will definitely stay again

Negative_Review: No muesli for breakfast only cornflakes etc
Positive_Review: The hotel was close to the Metro and to the Champs de l Elysee also restaurants museums and the Seine

Negative_Review: This is a very pricey neighborhood and all the restaurants were pretty expensive even by Paris standards I went to Montmartre and had a equally great meal for a better price
Positive_Review: The Paris breakfast which was included with the room rate was perfect for me The hotel is near the Israeli embassy so there are soldiers guarding the corner near the hotel making the area safer

Negative_Review: The only thing was the wifi was spotty
Positive_Review: Loved that they used L occitane products in the bathroom The room and bathroom size is also slightly bigger than average for Paris There s also a cute little balcony and the breakfast is standard good French pastries juices and coffee You can upgrade to a hot breakfast for a fee The location is excellent A 2 min walk to Champs lys es and 3 4 min walk to any subway station A 30 min walk to the Eiffel Tower A 5 min walk to the Seine and a 3 min walk to the avenue with all the brand shops There s also a small vintage store next to the hotel but it was never open when we were there so not sure what the hours are It was my moms bday and they made sure to make it special for her The service was really good They sent recommendations before our trip which was great

Negative_Review: Basic breakfast was basic and perhaps the additional breakfast should have been included in the price
Positive_Review: Excellent customer service and perfect location for the Paris marathon

Negative_Review: I wish they somehow had room for a small fitness room with free weights and a bench It would have been great if the Parisian breakfast included whole fruit
Positive_Review: The location was just off the Champ Elysees walking distance to everywhere The bed was excellent as was the climate control in the room The guest bathroom on the ground floor was convenient

Negative_Review: Wifi is very weak and unstable especially in the 5th floor cracked paint on rooms roof All Room walls is dark and not painted But covered by cloth Breakfast is very poor comparing to the money I paid Furniture is very old Elevator is scary
Positive_Review: Staff was good Location is quite good

The breakfast was good the bed was one of the most comfortable hotel beds I have slept in and staff more than happy to be of service Close to tourist attractions restuarants and the Champe Elysees for shopping

Negative_Review: There is nothing that I could say negative about H tel Elysees Mermoz absolutely exceeded expectations in every regard
Positive_Review: While the facilities were top notch the location was fantastic and the price was very reasonable it was the staff that were the real stand out at H tel Elysees Mermoz They were exceptionally friendly and helpful could not praise them more highly

Negative_Review: Couldn t turn the heating down from the thermostat in the room so ended up turning off the radiator and opening the window but nothing that was insurmountable
Positive_Review: Great location very friendly and helpful staff Plenty of toiletries and refreshments in the room nice and clean Would not stay in any other hotel if we were to visit Paris again

The accommodations were excellent The room was spacious and the staff was friendly and helpful Close to many wonderful sites and restaurants We were even given an upgraded junior suite which was a pleasant surprise

Negative_Review: No complemntry water in the room No room service at night we couldn t find a small shop to buy some food near by at 10 pm
Positive_Review: tthe clean rooms the design toiletries
The staff were very very friendly and supportive more than expected Quick action and smiley faces all the time I my wife and daughter enjoyed our time a lot

Negative_Review: Very Small rooms The way of splitting the breakfast to two types french and intercontinental and you have to pay more to get more than the french BF 1st time for me to see like this Expensive compare to the facilities The bath room is separate from the shower room Old building and need renovation
Positive_Review: The staff are very friendly and cooperative Clean place Location Fast free WiFi
Free wifi everywhere free phone call in EU Location is great and very close from metro station and champ elysees street Many cafes and restaurants around hotel Hotel amenities are L Occitane

Negative_Review: The fact that it clearly stated that room service finished at 11 but that we were not able to order it when we tried about 10 30 as they said it was over for the day
Positive_Review: The staff were very pleasant and helpful Particularly the gentleman who did the night shift Very good location
The hotel was in a very good location with many small restaurants nearby It is a modern boutique hotel It was ideal for a family with 2 small children

Negative_Review: The rooms were quite small Upon arrival we upgraded from deluxe to a junior suite
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was centrally located next to the Champs lys es It was ideal for shopping

Negative_Review: Poor variety breakfast Very very narrow corridors The size of the rooms is so small actually tiny Staff were ok Not so helpful There was hair on the new sheets when we just enter the room after check in Nevertheless the price is sooo expensive
Positive_Review: The good thing about this hotel is the location only near by a lot of things

Negative_Review: There were no pictures on the walls in the room
Positive_Review: This hotel was a great value The rooms were small but adequate The location and breakfast was great We had a street view that was pretty neat The wifi was fast

Negative_Review: The shower bath design is not too well thought out due to the potential for spillage on the floor because the shower head must be positioned rather forward looking as it is prone to droop due to the weight of the shower head but all in all this is a minor inconvenience
Positive_Review: The staff of this hotel are very attentive and friendly The rooms are standard size They are both comfortable and quiet The breakfast is a standard French breakfast of excellent quality food and beverages The hotel is in an excellent location a very short walk from the Champs Elysee and metro services

Negative_Review: Our breakfast appetite is small so we did not eat in the hotel but preferred to take a coffee and croissant in a nearby coffee shop where there is plenty of choice Overall we were more than happy with the hotel
Positive_Review: The reception staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful We had dealings mostly with Ana who always greeted us with a smile and was more than helpful in dealing with our queries and requests While our room was kept spotlessly clean a temporary maid caused us a problem because of carelessness Fortunately this was solved
Fabulous location 10min walk from a lot of the main attractions Lovely staff very helpful and English speaking Great restaurants nearby Our room was lovely we got an upgrade

Negative_Review: Maybe some products for the bath bath salts bubble bath etc
Positive_Review: Breakfast was nice We were given a free upgrade to a junior suite upon arrival The staff were very friendly We found the pillows too hard on our first night but they were changed when we put in a request for softer ones

Negative_Review: If I was to be very picky the toilet is not in the same room as the bathroom not a big deal tho
Positive_Review: We were made welcome from the very start staff spoke good English and helped us as much as they could room facility s location and cleanliness were excellent I would recommend this hotel to anyone

Negative_Review: internet went out over the holiday weekend
Positive_Review: Wonderful central location close to everything staff was friendly and responsive great breakfast very clean and modern

Negative_Review: It was a brief visit and all was good I didn t have breakfast as the price seems ridiculous though it seems standard
Positive_Review: Location and room were super

Negative_Review: 1 Room rate about 500 per night 2 The sound proof requires improvement
Positive_Review: 1 Junior Suite 301 nicely decorated two combined beds that become one large bed in the room a comfortable sofa bed in the living area modern bath shower with good water pressure safe box 2 flat screen TVs and towels toiletries refurbished on daily basis 2 Proximity to shopping heavens of Champs Elysees Avenue Montaigne and cafes restaurants 3 Inviting lounge Very friendly accommodating staff especially Ana at the reception 4 Free WiFi anywhere in the building 5 Quiet street for peaceful night

Negative_Review: Would have preferred to be warned beforehand of the City of Paris tax which took us by surprise
Positive_Review: Anna Stefan were priceless individuals who went out of their way to welcome U S and make us comfortable We felt special

This hotel was amazing The check in was exceptional The receptionist black hair shoulder length with Spanish Portuguese accent unfortunately did not note her name was very friendly and professional She was very helpful with our questions about the area and Paris We got an upgrade which was lovely They have free phone calls from your room phone to anywhere in the world Very nice touch They also have a bar in reception area which you can help yourself to Nice as a nightcap before our return to the room each night The room was spacious and clean We had a comfy king bed The bathroom was spacious for a Paris hotel The L Occitane toiletries were nice The extra touches of toothbrush paste cosmetic pads and ear buds were nice Tea and coffee in the room was good and extra milk was never a issue when we asked

The staff were welcoming The room was clean and comfortable and adequate space considering the hotel s central location The location was fantastic Walking distance to Champs lys es Arc De Triomphe and River Seine Very quiet despite its central location
